You can reach Muvattupuzha from other cities

by train to the nearby town Aluva or Kochi. There are two major Railway stations in Kochi (Ernakulam Town and Ernakulam Junction, locally known as North and South railway stations). The Indian Railways (http://www.indianrail.gov.in) serves Cochin with a number of train services connecting it to other parts of the state and the country. From Kochi in a little over an hour by bus or in mere 45 minutes by car you can reach

POYALI Mountain, It is a historical place. The name of mountain is related to a person ans story. His name is Ali...   Ali has been gone through the mountain....So the peoples named this as POYALI..The meaning of POYALI in malayalam is "The way that gone by Ali"
